Title: Authorizes certain public employers to offer temporary retirement incentives; provides an age 55/25 years temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees
Summary: Authorizes certain public employers to offer temporary retirement incentives (Part A); provides an age 55/25 years temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees (Part B).
ActClause: AN ACT to authorize employers to provide a temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees in the city of New York (Part A); and to provide an age 55/25 years temporary retirement incentive for certain public employees in the city of New York (Part B)
